title: Gold Watch Of Captain Who Saved 700 Titanic Passengers Sells For $1.96 million
content: $1.96 million is the highest amount ever paid for memorabilia belonging to Titanic, the auctioneers said.
summary: $1.96 million is the highest amount ever paid for memorabilia belonging to Titanic, the auctioneers said.

title: Brazil First Lady Uses F-Word For Elon Musk In Viral Video. He Reacts
content: Brazil's first lady, Janja Lula da Silva, swore at billionaire Elon Musk during a G20 social event on Saturday at which she spoke about the need to regulate social media to rein in misinformation.
summary: Brazil's first lady, Janja Lula da Silva, swore at billionaire Elon Musk during a G20 social event on Saturday at which she spoke about the need to regulate social media to rein in misinformation.

title: Prosecutors On How Rapper Diddy Is Trying To Influence Witnesses From Jail
content: US rapper Sean 'Diddy' Combs, facing serious sex trafficking and abuse charges, is trying to contact potential witnesses and sway public opinion from jail to influence the jurors, prosecutors have claimed.
summary: US rapper Sean 'Diddy' Combs, facing serious sex trafficking and abuse charges, is trying to contact potential witnesses and sway public opinion from jail to influence the jurors, prosecutors have claimed.

title: Flares Land Near Netanyahu's Home, Month After Hezbollah Drone Attack
content: Two flares landed near Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence on Saturday in the central town of Caesarea, security services said, describing the incident as "serious".
summary: Two flares landed near Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's residence on Saturday in the central town of Caesarea, security services said, describing the incident as "serious".

title: Chris Wright, Climate Change Skeptic, To Be Trump's Energy Secretary
content: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated fracking magnate and climate change skeptic Chris Wright as energy secretary on Saturday, tasking him with "cutting red tape" which the new administration hopes will drive investment in fossil fuels.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated fracking magnate and climate change skeptic Chris Wright as energy secretary on Saturday, tasking him with "cutting red tape" which the new administration hopes will drive investment in fossil fuels.

title: Google AI Chatbot Gemini Turns Rogue, Tells User To "Please Die"

title: Climate Sceptic, Fracking Magnate Nominated As US Energy Chief
content: US President-elect Donald Trump nominated fracking magnate and climate change sceptic Chris Wright as energy secretary on Saturday, tasking him with "cutting red tape" which the new administration hopes will drive investment in fossil fuels.

title: Super Typhoon Man-Yi Hits Philippines, Forcing Lakhs to Flee
content: Super Typhoon Man-yi battered the Philippines on Saturday, with the national weather forecaster warning of a "potentially catastrophic and life-threatening" impact as huge waves pounded the archipelago's coastline.
summary: Super Typhoon Man-yi battered the Philippines on Saturday, with the national weather forecaster warning of a "potentially catastrophic and life-threatening" impact as huge waves pounded the archipelago's coastline.

title: 8 Killed, 17 Injured As 21-Year-Old Goes On Stabbing Spree In China
content: Eight people were killed and 17 others wounded Saturday in a knife attack at a vocational school in eastern China, and the suspect -- a former student -- has been arrested, police said.
summary: Eight people were killed and 17 others wounded Saturday in a knife attack at a vocational school in eastern China, and the suspect -- a former student -- has been arrested, police said.

title: Revolutionary Or Deceptive? China's Robotic Fish Raise Eyebrows
content: Social media reactions range from demands for refunds to support for reducing live animal captivity. This follows a similar instance at Shanghai Haichang Ocean Park in 2022.
summary: Social media reactions range from demands for refunds to support for reducing live animal captivity. This follows a similar instance at Shanghai Haichang Ocean Park in 2022.

title: "We Need A British Trump": Former Prime Minister Elizabeth Truss
content: Former British prime minister Elizabeth Truss on Saturday pitched for bringing the "best of reforms", fixing some arrangements in the "powerful bureaucracy" in the United Kingdom.
summary: Former British prime minister Elizabeth Truss on Saturday pitched for bringing the "best of reforms", fixing some arrangements in the "powerful bureaucracy" in the United Kingdom.

title: Who Is Jutta Leerdam? Jake Paul's Olympic Medallist Girlfriend
content: Jake Paul triumphed over boxing legend Mike Tyson in a highly anticipated match at AT&T Stadium, winning 79-73.

title: Pizzeria Owner's Son Takes Employees Hostage Near Paris
content: A knife-wielding man on Saturday took several employees hostage in his father's restaurant on the outskirts of Paris as a large police force surrounded the establishment.
summary: A knife-wielding man on Saturday took several employees hostage in his father's restaurant on the outskirts of Paris as a large police force surrounded the establishment.

title: 10-Fold Rise In Illegal Border Crossing As Indians Leave Canada For US
content: Illegal immigration from Canada to the United States has seen a sharp rise among people of Indian origin, US border patrol data shows.
summary: Illegal immigration from Canada to the United States has seen a sharp rise among people of Indian origin, US border patrol data shows.

title: UK's Foreign Student Policy Backfires: Indian Enrollments Drops 20%
content: Indian student groups in the UK said the fall was to be expected amid limited job prospects and also safety concerns following recent anti-immigration riots in some cities.
summary: Indian student groups in the UK said the fall was to be expected amid limited job prospects and also safety concerns following recent anti-immigration riots in some cities.

title: US To India In 30 Minutes? Elon Musk Discusses Future Of Ultra-Fast Travel
content: The Starship rocket, capable of carrying up to 1,000 passengers, promises intercontinental travel at record speeds, such as 30 minutes from Delhi to San Francisco.

title: Japan Nuclear Reactor Resumes Power Generation, For First Time In 13 Years
content: A reactor at the Onagawa nuclear plant in Miyagi Prefecture, northeastern Japan, has resumed power generation for the first time since the Fukushima nuclear disaster in March 2011, its operator said.
summary: A reactor at the Onagawa nuclear plant in Miyagi Prefecture, northeastern Japan, has resumed power generation for the first time since the Fukushima nuclear disaster in March 2011, its operator said.

title: G7 Says Russia Solely Responsible For Preventing Peace In Ukraine War
content: Russia is solely responsible for preventing a fair settlement to end the war in Ukraine, the G7 said on Saturday, in a statement marking 1,000 days of the Russian invasion.
summary: Russia is solely responsible for preventing a fair settlement to end the war in Ukraine, the G7 said on Saturday, in a statement marking 1,000 days of the Russian invasion.

title: Zelensky Wants To End War With Russia By 2025 Through "Diplomatic Means"
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Saturday he would like to end the war with Russia next year through "diplomatic means".
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Saturday he would like to end the war with Russia next year through "diplomatic means".

title: Boeing Lays Off Over 400 Members Of Professional Aerospace Union
content: Boeing has laid off more than 400 members of its professional aerospace labour union, the union has revealed.
summary: Boeing has laid off more than 400 members of its professional aerospace labour union, the union has revealed.
